item.title: Eurasian ice sheet collapse was a major source of Meltwater Pulse 1A 14,600 years ago
item.description: We show that marine-based sectors of the Eurasian ice sheet complex collapsed at the BÃ¸lling transition and contributed significantly to Meltwater Pulse 1a.
